name: Daily Water Intake
summary: Track your daily water consumption to stay properly hydrated throughout the day
cues_and_stacking: Keep a water bottle visible on your desk. Drink water before each meal.
contraindications: Consult doctor if you have kidney issues

coach_copy.recovery_line: Don't worry, tomorrow is a fresh start for hydration

name: Morning Push-ups
summary: Start your day with a set of push-ups to build upper body strength and energy
cues_and_stacking: Do push-ups right after getting out of bed, before checking your phone
contraindications: Avoid if you have wrist or shoulder injuries

coach_copy.recovery_line: Recovery is part of the process - you've got this!

name: Daily Meditation
summary: Practice mindfulness meditation to reduce stress and improve focus
cues_and_stacking: Meditate immediately after your morning coffee, in the same quiet spot
contraindications: Start with shorter sessions if you have anxiety

coach_copy.encourage_line: Your mind is becoming clearer each day!
coach_copy.recovery_line: Missing meditation is normal - start fresh tomorrow
coach_copy.celebration_line: You've found your zen! Amazing consistency!

name: Protein Tracking
summary: Monitor your daily protein intake to support muscle growth and recovery
cues_and_stacking: Log protein immediately after each meal
contraindications: Consult nutritionist if you have kidney disease

coach_copy.recovery_line: Every meal is a new chance to fuel right
coach_copy.celebration_line: Protein master! Your muscles thank you!

name: Evening Stretching
summary: Wind down with gentle stretching to improve flexibility and sleep quality
cues_and_stacking: Stretch after changing into pajamas, before reading

coach_copy.encourage_line: Your body feels more flexible each day!
coach_copy.recovery_line: Tomorrow's stretch will feel even better

name: Daily Steps Goal
summary: Achieve your daily step count to improve cardiovascular health and energy
cues_and_stacking: Take stairs instead of elevator, park farther away
contraindications: Start with lower goal if sedentary

coach_copy.recovery_line: Tomorrow's steps start with the first one
coach_copy.celebration_line: Step champion! Your heart is stronger!

name: Gratitude Journal
summary: Write down three things you're grateful for to boost mood and perspective
min_viable: Write one thing you're grateful for
cues_and_stacking: Write in journal right after morning coffee or before bed
equipment: Journal and pen or smartphone app

coach_copy.reminder_line: What are you grateful for today? üôè
coach_copy.encourage_line: Your positive mindset is growing stronger!
coach_copy.recovery_line: There's always something to be grateful for
coach_copy.celebration_line: Gratitude guru! Your perspective is beautiful!

name: Deep Breathing Exercise
summary: Practice deep breathing techniques to reduce stress and anxiety
cues_and_stacking: Practice deep breathing when feeling stressed or before important meetings

coach_copy.recovery_line: Each breath brings you back to center
coach_copy.celebration_line: Breathing master! You've found your calm!
